From: Dr. Kioni Re: WDRKLOVE POSITIVE VIBES WEBCAST OUTAGE Date: 07/18/03 You may have noticed I was having technical difficulties with the Positive Vibes Webcast yesterday. The cable company said the problem was on their side and it was repaired in a short period of time. Nevertheless, the live Webcast was spotty at best and the outage occurred when a lot of you were listening. I sure hope you didn’t mind listening to the Best of Positive Vibes earlier than scheduled. On the upside, I am now keeping the live stream online until 11pm EST weekdays. The evening Webcast of Positive Vibes will feature music only – no success talk, nor public service announcements. mp3motivator Nightingale-Conant Personal Development http://drkioni.com/products.html

DrKioni.com began hosting the TVRadio Network today. The TVRadio Network is a rapidly growing FREE TV/Radio Guide, that offers access to over 1000's of ONLINE television and radio stations worldwide. Services include: all stations organized by both LOCATION and CATEGORY, plus a full station database search option. REAL PLAYER and WINDOWS MP options. (when available). Other user features include a Plug-ins Center, "Favorites" options, "Send Station to a Friend", and much more... http://drkioni.com/media.html

urlLink DrKioni.com WDRK-LOVE Internet Radio - TVRadio Network - Smooth Jazz, Cool Jazz, Streaming Audio - Live Audio The Internet radio station WDRK-Love and the popular program Positive Vibes is back on the air! Anyone can listen 24/7 by visiting DrKioni.com and clicking on the gold speaker icon located on every page or the Internet Radio tab on the main menus. Keep in mind that the FREE stream is limited to only to 20 listeners . However if having a choice of the best stations on AudioRealm appeals to you, then listen to WDRK-Love's high quality digital stream on the AudioRealm Network where the stream is never full! Luckymojo.com and DrKioni.com are proud to present the Luckymojo Hoodoo Rootwork Hour. Every Wed evening at 10PM Eastern Time, participants in the Hoodoo Rootwork Course come together on a conference line to discuss hoodoo (African American Herbal Magic - Conjure with Cat Yronwode from Luckymojo.com and Dr. Kioni from DrKioni.com. The Luckymojo Hoodoo Rootwork hour also features old time hoodoo blues and luminaries from the hoodoo and metaphysical community. The show can be heard live on WDRK-Love via DrKioni.com.
